title: Understanding the Terms
text: In the context of this textbook, the terms 'child' and 'student' have specific meanings. Think about the age groups and educational stages they might refer to.

hintAnswer: child refers to $$infants$$, toddlers, and young children
title: Defining 'Child'
text: What age group does the term 'child' refer to in this textbook?
choices: child refers to $$infants$$, toddlers, and young children
child refers to individuals from preschool through $$\frac{transition}{vocational}$$ programs
child refers to $$infants$$ student refers to individuals from preschool through $$\frac{transition}{vocational}$$ programs

hintAnswer: student refers to individuals from preschool through $$\frac{transition}{vocational}$$ programs
title: Defining 'Student'
text: What age group does the term 'student' refer to in this textbook?
choices: student refers to individuals from preschool through $$\frac{transition}{vocational}$$ programs
student refers to $$infants$$, toddlers, and young children
child refers to $$infants$$, toddlers, and young children; student refers to individuals from preschool

title: Putting It Together
text: Now that you know the definitions of 'child' and 'student', try to combine them to answer the main question.
